CustomField.description: Number of days between the Cert Issued Date and the Cert Returned Date. Zero if negative or missing dates.
CustomField.formula: IF(IF( Certificate_Review_Return_Date__c - Certificate_Issue_Date__c <0,NULL,Certificate_Review_Return_Date__c - Certificate_Issue_Date__c)>999,NULL,IF( Certificate_Review_Return_Date__c - Certificate_Issue_Date__c <0,NULL,Certificate_Review_Return_Date__c - Certificate_Issue_Date__c))
CustomField.label: # Days Management Selection
